results.title: Diabetic adverse events associated with three commonly used statins: a disproportionality analysis based on the FDA adverse event reporting system database.
results.text_hl: Disproportionality analyses revealed a significant association between these statins and four specific @DISEASE_Drug_Related_Side_Effects_and_Adverse_Reactions @DISEASE_MESH:D064420 @@@diabetic adverse events@@@: @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@type 2 diabetes mellitus@@@, @DISEASE_Glucose_Intolerance @DISEASE_MESH:D018149 @@@impaired glucose tolerance@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Diabetic_Neuropathies</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003929 @@@diabetic neuropathy@@@, and @DISEASE_Papilledema @DISEASE_MESH:D010211 @@@diabetic retinal edema@@@.

citations.NLM: Deng B, Li S, You R, Fu Z. Diabetic adverse events associated with three commonly used statins: a disproportionality analysis based on the FDA adverse event reporting system database. Expert Opin Drug Saf. 2024 Oct 18;():1-8. PMID: 39412195
citations.BibTeX: @article{39412195, title={Diabetic adverse events associated with three commonly used statins: a disproportionality analysis based on the FDA adverse event reporting system database.}, author={Deng B and Li S and You R and Fu Z}, journal={Expert Opin Drug Saf}, pages={1-8}}

results.title: Extrapyramidal side effect of donepezil hydrochloride in an elderly patient
results.text_hl: She had a medical history of multiple major illnesses: a 30-year history of @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@ treated with @CHEMICAL_Amlodipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine besylate@@@ (5 mg/day), a 17-year history of @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@type 2 diabetes mellitus@@@ treated with @CHEMICAL_glimepiride @CHEMICAL_MESH:C057619 @@@glimepiride@@@ (4 mg/day), a 10-year history of @<m>DISEASE_Diabetic_Neuropathies</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003929 @@@diabetic neuropathy@@@ treated with @CHEMICAL_mecobalamin @CHEMICAL_MESH:C019476 @@@methylcobalamin@@@ (1.5 mg/day), a 10-year history of @DISEASE_Osteoporosis @DISEASE_MESH:D010024 @@@osteoporosis@@@ treated with calcium carbonate D3 (600 mg/day), and a history of @DISEASE_Carotid_Stenosis @DISEASE_MESH:D016893 @@@carotid and lower-extremity arterial plaques@@@ treated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ (20 mg/day) and enteric-coated @CHEMICAL_Aspirin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001241 @@@aspirin@@@ (100 mg/day).

citations.NLM: Li HC, Luo KX, Wang JS, Wang QX. Extrapyramidal side effect of donepezil hydrochloride in an elderly patient Medicine (Baltimore). 2020 Mar;99(11):e19443. PMID: 32176074
citations.BibTeX: @article{32176074, title={Extrapyramidal side effect of donepezil hydrochloride in an elderly patient}, author={Li HC and Luo KX and Wang JS and Wang QX}, journal={Medicine (Baltimore)}, volume={99}, number={11}, pages={e19443}}

results.title: Effect of statins on oxidative DNA damage in diabetic polyneuropathy
results.text_hl: The aim of this study was to determine the effects of @CHEMICAL_Ezetimibe @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069438 @@@ezetimibe@@@/@<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Rosuvastatin_Calcium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068718 @@@rosuvastatin@@@ on DNA damage in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Diabetic_Neuropathies</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003929 @@@DPN@@@.

citations.NLM: Carrillo-Ibarra S, Miranda-Díaz AG, Sifuentes-Franco S, Cardona-Muñoz EG, Rodríguez-Carrizalez AD, Villegas-Rivera G, Román-Pintos LM. Effect of statins on oxidative DNA damage in diabetic polyneuropathy J Circ Biomark. 2018 Jan-Dec;7():1849454418804099. PMID: 30302131
citations.BibTeX: @article{30302131, title={Effect of statins on oxidative DNA damage in diabetic polyneuropathy}, author={Carrillo-Ibarra S and Miranda-Díaz AG and Sifuentes-Franco S and Cardona-Muñoz EG and Rodríguez-Carrizalez AD and Villegas-Rivera G and Román-Pintos LM}, journal={J Circ Biomark}, volume={7}, pages={1849454418804099}}

results.title: Effects of Ezetimibe/Simvastatin and Rosuvastatin on Oxidative Stress in Diabetic Neuropathy: A Randomized, Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled Clinical Trial
results.text_hl: To evaluate the effects of @CHEMICAL_Ezetimibe @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069438 @@@ezetimibe@@@/@<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ (EZE/@<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SIMV@@@) and @CHEMICAL_Rosuvastatin_Calcium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068718 @@@rosuvastatin@@@ (ROSUV) on oxidative stress (OS) markers in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Diabetic_Neuropathies</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003929 @@@diabetic polyneuropathy@@@ (DPN).

citations.NLM: Villegas-Rivera G, Román-Pintos LM, Cardona-Muñoz EG, Arias-Carvajal O, Rodríguez-Carrizalez AD, Troyo-Sanromán R, Pacheco-Moisés FP, Moreno-Ulloa A, Miranda-Díaz AG. Effects of Ezetimibe/Simvastatin and Rosuvastatin on Oxidative Stress in Diabetic Neuropathy: A Randomized, Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled Clinical Trial Oxid Med Cell Longev. 2015;2015():756294. PMID: 26290682
citations.BibTeX: @article{26290682, title={Effects of Ezetimibe/Simvastatin and Rosuvastatin on Oxidative Stress in Diabetic Neuropathy: A Randomized, Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled Clinical Trial}, author={Villegas-Rivera G and Román-Pintos LM and Cardona-Muñoz EG and Arias-Carvajal O and Rodríguez-Carrizalez AD and Troyo-Sanromán R and Pacheco-Moisés FP and Moreno-Ulloa A and Miranda-Díaz AG}, journal={Oxid Med Cell Longev}, volume={2015}, pages={756294}}

results.title: Lipid modulation in insulin-dependent diabetes mellitus: effect on microvascular outcomes.
results.text_hl: In conclusion, treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ may have a beneficial effect on early @DISEASE_Kidney_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D007674 @@@nephropathy@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Diabetic_Neuropathies</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003929 @@@diabetic neuropathy@@@, justifying a fully powered trial.

citations.NLM: Fried LF, Forrest KY, Ellis D, Chang Y, Silvers N, Orchard TJ. Lipid modulation in insulin-dependent diabetes mellitus: effect on microvascular outcomes. J Diabetes Complications. 2001 May-Jun;15(3):113-9. PMID: 11358679
citations.BibTeX: @article{11358679, title={Lipid modulation in insulin-dependent diabetes mellitus: effect on microvascular outcomes.}, author={Fried LF and Forrest KY and Ellis D and Chang Y and Silvers N and Orchard TJ}, journal={J Diabetes Complications}, volume={15}, number={3}, pages={113-9}}
